# iru_device_action_reinstall_agent (Action)

Reinstalls the Iru Agent on macOS devices.

## Example Usage

```terraform
action "iru_device_action_reinstall_agent" "example" {
  device_id = "8a9f88d9-e7f4-47e6-9326-fd4b39534c4e"
}
```

<!-- action schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `device_id` (String)
